title: Almabtrieb Festival
description: Join this festive alpine tradition where cows are paraded through the village in colorful decorations.

title: Snowboarding Weekend
description: Experience the thrill of snowboarding on the best slopes with expert instructors.

title: Mountain Hiking Tour
description: Join us for an exhilarating hiking tour through breathtaking mountain landscapes.

title: Ruhpolding Beer Fest
description: Enjoy a weekend of local brews, delicious food, and live music at the beer fest.

title: Christmas Village Market
description: Experience the magic of Christmas with festive stalls and holiday treats in the village.
